en.title: How it works
en.body__markdown:
In this session we will do a meditation exercise together. 

There will be time for reflecting on your own and, if you like, sharing your thoughts in the group. 

A handy tip is to use a headset and make sure to be in a place where you can focus and feel comfortable. 

For more details check the [code of conduct](https://wiki.29k.org/user-code-of-conduct).
